content: this legal text is about a court case involving the coownership of a property the case has been ongoing for 18 years and 1 month the final resolution is that the property which includes a family house economic building yard and arable land will be sold at a public auction the proceeds from the sale will be divided proportionally among the coowners the court made this decision based on the property act and the fact that the litigant parties are former spouses the court determined that the property can be divided into two separate functional units since the parties couldnt agree on a method of dissolution the court ordered a civil division according to the property act the defendant did not contest the method of dissolution and it was established that the coownership shares are equal the plaintiffs request for a larger share was rejected the judgment specifies that the proceeds from the sale will be divided equally between the parties however the defendant has appealed the decision claiming a violation of procedural rules
